title: 50 Cent Buys A Blinged-Out Diamond Chain For His Son's 7th Birthday Present
text:
50 Cent is always decked out in the dopest diamond bling, but he just decided to draft his 7-year-old son into the club buying his a $50,000 chain for his birthday.

Fifty shared a picture of the unbelievable gift on Instagram over the weekend. The chain spells out his son's name "Sire" and is packed with beautiful diamonds.

Related:

50 Cent Releases Recording Revealing Randall Emmett and Lala Kent Contract Terms

'Vanderpump' Star Lala Kent's Fiancé Slammed For Poor Grammar AGAIN, Months After 'Fofty' Blunder

50 Cent Turns Away Wendy Williams at His Tycoon Pool Party

50 Cent Clowns Ja Rule and Irv Gotti for Getting Denied at NYC Nightclub

50 Cent Celebrates Birthday at Liv Night Club in Miami

View photos

Our sources say the necklace goes for around $50K, but Fifty is a good customer so he may get a frequent flyer discount.

"SIRE Little BOSS DRIP," the rapper captioned a picture of the chain.

This isn't the only present the A-lister got for his son. Fifty, along with Sire's mother Daphne Joy, threw a Roblox themed party on his real birthday Sept. 2. The party even featured mini celebrities like Chris Brown's daughter Royalty.

View photos

“My little guy SIRE turned 7 today,” 50 Cent wrote on Instagram. “Go shorty, it’s ya birthday.”

Hundreds of thousands of people commented sending birthday wishes to Sire.

50 Cent has been on fire lately with his huge hit show, "Power." Plus, it seems he is co-parenting with Daphne Joy with no issues.

As one person pointed out on social media, this is the kind of present that you DON'T grow out of...ever.
description: You Have To See This Chain!
